xml:
Femoston<tm tmtype="reg"/> 1 mg/10 mg Indications and dose

Menopausal symptoms in women with a uterus

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 14 days, white tablet to be taken and started within 5 days of onset of menstruation (or any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), then 1 tablet daily for 14 days, grey tablet to be taken, subsequent courses repeated without interval, Femoston 1 mg/10 mg given initially and Femoston 2 mg/ 10 mg substituted if symptoms not controlled.

Osteoporosis prophylaxis in women with a uterus

By mouth

  • Adult

    1 tablet daily for 14 days, white tablet to be taken and started within 5 days of onset of menstruation (or any time if cycles have ceased or are infrequent), then 1 tablet daily for 14 days, grey tablet to be taken, subsequent courses repeated without interval.

 Clinical medicinal product information Clinical medicinal product information
